items.sentence: I heard Tom is planning on going to Boston next weekend.

There are a lot of things that Tom would like to change.
The teacher made fun of Tom in front of the whole class.

I don't think that these are Tom's and Mary's umbrellas.

The population of Shanghai is as large as that of Tokyo.

I always think of my father when I look at this picture.
